resources.string: %s would like to access your Photos for saving and uploading photos to the app. This app will not automatically upload any of your photos or videos to the cloud, nor will it access content you have not selected. You won\'t be able to select photos for editing if you deny Photos permission.
%s is currently allowed to access selected photos. For full functionality, consider allowing access to all photos.
Please allow %s access and select your photos to enhance your user experience.
Please grant album access permission and try again.
Please grant storage permission to save and edit files, and try again.
Please grant camera permission and try again.
You can select up to %d photos or videos.
You cannot select photos and videos at the same time.
No app available to take photos.
